name: redux-ship
description: Composable, testable and typable side effects for Redux

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g clarus/redux-ship
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:clarus/redux-ship gh-pages --force
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:main && npm run build:module

author: Guillaume Claret
